title: Land for Sale in Bawa Place, Borella
details:
Property located on Bawa Place, Borella, Colombo 08. Easily accessible to Cotta Road.

Land Extent: c. 13.15 Perches

Old house currently resides on the property. Selling for land value.

Approach Road: Approximately 20 feet wide.

Clear Title.

Expected price: LKR 8.5 Million Per Perch.
